articles.author: Brandon Griggs, CNN
articles.title: James Caan, Oscar-nominated actor of 'The Godfather,' 'Misery' and 'Elf,' dies at 82
articles.description: James Caan, the veteran screen actor known for his work in such films as "The Godfather," "Misery" and "Elf," has died, his family said in a statement on his verified Twitter account. He was 82.
articles.content: (CNN)James Caan, the veteran screen actor known for his work in such films as "The Godfather," "Misery" and "Elf," has died, his family said in a statement on his verified Twitter account. He was 82.… [+1995 chars]

articles.title: A look back at Boris Johnson's career as UK Prime Minister - CNN Video
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson resigned, ending his scandal-plagued tenure leading the Conservative party in the United Kingdom. CNN's Max Foster looks back at his career.

articles.author: Richard Allen Greene, CNN
articles.title: What happens when a British Prime Minister resigns?
articles.description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced his resignation on Thursday following mounting pressure from lawmakers in his own party to stand down.

articles.author: Eliza Mackintosh and Luke McGee, CNN
articles.title: Who might replace Boris Johnson as UK Prime Minister
articles.description: Rivals of Britain's Prime Minister Boris Johnson have been plotting to replace him as scandals have mounted. Here are some of the possible contenders in a Conservative Party leadership contest.

articles.title: Opinion: Boris Johnson's empire of lies has finally collapsed

articles.title: Boris Johnson: How the nation's favorite clown fell from grace
articles.description: Boris Johnson is set to resign as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, bringing his scandal-plagued tenure to an end after less than three years.

articles.title: Live updates: Boris Johnson, UK Prime Minister, to resign

British Prime Minister Boris Johnson waves from the steps of No. 10 Downing Street after giving a statement in London in July 2019. He had just become prime minister.
